SEARCH
Package com.prototype.occupi.repository

Interface DeviceRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Device,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Device,String>
@Repository public interface DeviceRepository extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Device,String>
The DeviceRepository interface is a Spring Data repository that provides methods for performing CRUD operations on Device objects in a database. It extends the CrudRepository interface and defines additional methods for finding and deleting Device objects by their MAC address. This interface is annotated with @Repository to indicate that it is a Spring repository component.

      Device findDeviceByMac(String mac)
      Finds a device by its MAC address.
      Parameters:
      mac - the MAC address of the device to find
      Returns:
      the Device object that matches the specified MAC address, or null if no match is found
